law.catch_line: A court may enter an order for a child's adoption under this subtitle only if:...

text.section:
A court may enter an order for a child's adoption under this subtitle only if:
the child placement agency consents; and
for a child who is at least 10 years old, the child consents.

section.section:
A child placement agency may not withhold consent for the sole reason that:
the race, religion, color, or national origin of a prospective adoptive parent differs from that of the child or parent; or
a prospective adoptive parent has a disability.

A child placement agency may revoke consent at any time within the later of:
14 days after the child placement agency signs the consent; or
14 days after the adoption petition is filed.
A child who is at least 10 years old may revoke consent at any time before a court enters an order of adoption under this subtitle.
